item.title: Rebuilding a package using ABS
item.description: Rebuilding an Archlinux package using Arch Build System (ABS) Rebuilding a system package on Archlinux as a user is really simple using ABS. yaourt -S abs cp /etc/abs.conf ~/.abs.conf sed -i 's#.*ABSROOT.*#ABSROOT="\$HOME/abs"#' ~/.abs.conf mkdir ~/abs abs extra/nvidia cd ~/abs/extra/nvidia makepkg -s yaourt nvidia*.pkg.tar.xz
